readable.title: 872512911_ca383b40e4
readable.content: Large group of people , most setting down on a walkway with two boys standing up holding plates . Many people are sitting and observing or going into a water attraction . Many people sit or stand around the fountain near the Space Needle . People sit by a fountain , a guy with purple hair talks to a guy in a hat . Two men , one with purple hair , at crowded fountain near Seattle Space Needle .
